rooms.description: A welcoming entryway with floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light and adherence to Vastu principles by aligning with the east direction.
Spacious living area featuring floor-to-ceiling windows along the southern wall for enhanced sunlight exposure and a panoramic view.
Integrated dining space adjacent to the kitchen with north-east positioning to promote balance and harmony according to Vastu principles.
Modern kitchen designed with ample counter space, floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light, and positioned in the north-west to align with Vastu norms.
Guest room designed for privacy with a dedicated balcony facing east, ensuring proper energy flow and sunlight as per Vastu guidelines.
Spacious master bedroom with a private ensuite bathroom, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows on the eastern side for morning light and good Vastu alignment.
Cozy bedroom for children with ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows on the north-west side, ensuring a calm and balanced environment.
Entertainment space designed as a home theater with soundproofing and integrated multimedia systems. Placed in the center of the ground floor to ensure optimum viewing experience.
